Name: ironfang
Description: This trinket will make even the most docile dog appear ferocious. the basic bite -e322- of animals becomes piercing.

Name: ring of cold resistance
Description: A crucial piece of equipment for anyone insane enough to explore the highest peaks of this world.

Name: ring of fire resistance
Description: A crucial piece of equipment for anyone insane enough to explore the scorching deserts of this world.

Name: ring of poison resistance
Description: A crucial piece of equipment for anyone insane enough to explore the noxious swamps of this world.

Name: ring of shock resistance
Description: A crucial piece of equipment for anyone insane enough to explore the lightning storms of this world.

Name: crystalized warrior's blood
Description: You've been told that this gem is the crystalized blood of a great warrior of times past. as you hold it in your hand the thought itself seems to fill you with strength: +1 str and +1 attack.

Name: barkskin amulet
Description: This magical amulet turns your flesh rough and barklike... which makes you a great target practice for those fireballs (natural prot is set to 10 or +1 if already >= that, -5 fire resistance)

Name: champion's skull
Description: Apparently this is the skull of a legendary general. it is said that carrying it through training helps to gain insight and skill faster: +5% on each minute tick for task completion.

Name: pendant of fate
Description: This pendant will magically prevent some catastrophes from striking the wearer. not that its effectiveness could ever be verified.

Name: vigorous belt
Description: This belt is highly sought after by those who wear heavier armor. It will constantly reinvigorate the wearer, decreasing their fatigue.
